text:
@OliverDowden As all writers and poets know, there is never an end to a story. 

And all voters know each MP has a duty of care to his/her constituents.
And you cannot just shut the voters up because you don’t like things.

You have just failed during the Covid-19 crises.

At the first hurdle.
